com.redhat.rhn.manager.rhnset

Class RhnSetManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.redhat.rhn.manager.BaseManager
      • com.redhat.rhn.manager.rhnset.RhnSetManager

  • public class RhnSetManager
extends BaseManager
    RhnSetManager offers management methods for RhnSet objects giving you the ability to create, delete, update, and find them.

    • Method Summary

      static void store(RhnSet set)

    • Method Detail

      • findByLabel

        public static RhnSet findByLabel(java.lang.Long userId,
                 java.lang.String label,
                 SetCleanup cleanup)
        Returns a list of RhnSets found for the given label and userid.
        Parameters:
        userId - User Id for the RhnSet.
        label - Label for the RhnSet.
        cleanup - the cleanup that should be run when the set is stored
        Returns:
        List of RhnSets.

      • createSet

        public static RhnSet createSet(java.lang.Long userId,
               java.lang.String label,
               SetCleanup cleanup)
        Creates a new RhnSet.
        Parameters:
        userId - Userid to associate with the RhnSet.
        label - Label to associate with the RhnSet.
        cleanup - the cleanup that should be run when the set is stored
        Returns:
        a new instance of RhnSet associated with the given userId and label, and an empty list of elements.

      • deleteByLabel

        public static void deleteByLabel(java.lang.Long userId,
                 java.lang.String label)
        Removes the RhnSet which matches the given UserId and label.
        Parameters:
        userId - UserId of set
        label - Set label

      • remove

        public static void remove(RhnSet set)
        Removes the RhnSet
        Parameters:
        set - The set to remove.

      • store

        public static void store(RhnSet set)
        Stores the RhnSet in the db Replaces old set if one exists.
        Parameters:
        set - The set to store/save.
